resources.string: You can find your category of interest below, and by browsing the images of the handmade art in each category, choose your favourite one to buy!
If you are interested to learn more about this item, please click on the image!
Welcome to your profile page, where you can manage your account, view your orders and balance on your gift cards! ( The functionality on this page is not set yet!!!!)

Hi,
 My name is Parniyan and I'm a persian-canadian artist 
 who loves to create handmade art and sell them online. 
 I hope you enjoy the beauty of my art!
This page\'s code is not implemented yet, but the structure is the same as the \"Painting Category\".\nSorry for the inconvenience!

string-array.name: items_description
string-array.item: This painting offers the contrast of colors as well as the impasto technique, to display the beauty of white daisies on a dark navy background.\nMedium : acrylic paints and pastes
The peaceful walk of elephants on the calm and silent scenery in the beautiful sunset.\nMedium : Oil color
Vivid colors of fancy flowers will bring happiness and joy to your eyes, as well as your home.\nMedium : Acrylic paints and pastes
The exquisite blend of vivid and happy colors, to create the most beautiful abstract painting of the wild flowers bouquet in a vase ! \nMedium : Acrylic paints and pastes

Imagine a very calm afternoon walk in the most silent alley of the town, and seeing the beautiful bunches of small white flowers on top of the clay wall of an old house . . .\nMedium : Acrylic paints and pastes
Autumn in my eyes ! Happy, colorful and full of love and warmth.\nMedium : Acrylic paints and pastes
Abstract painting of peaceful and mysterious mountains.\nMedium : Acrylic paint
The most gorgeous and elegant flowers of all the time, orchids !\n Medium : Acrylic paints and pastes
Persian style painting ! making me homesick already . . .\nMedium : Acrylic paints, pastes and clay
A lovely walk in a rainy evening, in a Parisian park !\nMedium : Acrylic paints and pastes
